title: JSON to Notion configuration schema
description: Validates configuration input for the "JSON to Notion" script.

$schema.description: The JSON schema to use for the configuration file.

inputFile.description: The JSON file to import to Notion.

inputIsArray.description: If true, the input JSON file will be expected to be an array containing JSON objects. If false, the input JSON will be expected to be a JSON object where the value to each top-level key is another JSON object.
